document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">pass </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">Houses </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">musing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">slow </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">occupied </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">minds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">pass </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">minds </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">occupied </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: As we pass houses musing slow
